linesContent.text: Grenade Hits proc Chaotic Exchange, granting
Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.
수류탄 적중 시 혼돈의 교환을 제공하고
만큼의 수류탄 피해를 증가시키며 수류탄 재생 속도를 1.75초 만큼 줄입니다.
手雷命中会触发混沌交易，为你提供
额外基础手榴弹充能速率 1.75 秒。
Buff is refreshed on Weapon Kill or Grenade Kill. Grenade Kills grant 5 stacks.
El bufo se renueva con cada baja. Baja con granada otorga la maxima cantidad de Daño
增益持续时间可在击杀时刷新。手雷击杀直接获得 5 层增益。
Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.
Incurs a 3.1 seconds cooldown after firing.
开火后触发 3.1 秒冷却时间。
[PVE] 15% Body Shot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Precision Multiplier.
After Dodging within 15 metres of an Enemy:
You can dodge an unlimited amount of times for 6 seconds.
Can dodge up to 6 times per activation.
Rank-and-File Combatants spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal.
Incurs a 5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.
普通敌人生成中型水晶，高阶敌人生成大型水晶。
生成 5 块水晶后将进入 5 秒冷却。
Special and Power Weapons have a 20% chance to refund ammo.
Damage against Combatants is multiplied by 1.3x, then multiplied again by Combatant Rank Modifiers.
Grants Shielded buff and applies 40 Slow Stacks to Combatants within 7 meters.
• Lasts 20 seconds and grants a 100HP Overshield
• Shielded prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
7미터 이내에 있는 적들에게 감속 스택 40개를 부여합니다.
보호막은 20초 동안 지속되며 100HP의 체력을 가지고 있습니다.
보호막의 지속 시간은 피해를 입으면 초기화되며 질주, 직업 점프, 그리고 슬라이딩을 봉인합니다.
Only active for the first shot
Incurs a 0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by shooting quickly.
Effect increases linearly as health decreases
隐身持续时间（使用终结技的效果）：
精英敌人/守护者 = 9.8 秒 （12.7）
Reload Duration Scalar (Multiplies Reload Animation Duration by that number)
Reload Duration Scalar (Multiplies Reload Animation Duration by that number)
Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.
该特性对融合步枪的效果减半。
Effect increases linearly as health decreases
(Wolfpack Rounds can activate is a second time)
Does not stack with Chaos Accelerant's Bonus.
Tracking persists for 1 second after not aiming at the enemy.
20% Increased Damage and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.
+20% 伤害，+15 操控性，持续 7 秒。
4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.
Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate Blunt Execution Rounds.
4 秒冷却时间。武器在收起时也可触发。
需要冲刺或滑行的充能近战以及弹道猛击均不会触发该特性。
Dealing additional Non-Precision Damage refreshes the timer.
造成非精准伤害将刷新计时器。
Percentage Damage Increase for the next shot:
• 14% Increased Explosion Damage. Explosion Length and Width are increased to 14 metres.
• Explosion no longer deals self-damage and has no damage falloff.
• Increases Tripmine Durability to 100 HP with 50% Damage Resist.
• 爆炸伤害增加 14%。爆炸的长度和宽度增加到 14 米。
• 爆炸不再造成自我伤害，并且没有伤害衰减。
• 将感应手雷的耐久度提高到 100 生命值，并有 50% 的伤害抵抗。
Can be refreshed to up to 6.5 seconds.
该增益持续时间可以刷新，最长 6.5 秒。
Zoom acts as a multiplier to the hip-fire range falloff start and end distances while ADS.
In this case, it pushes out the weapon's effective range by 10%. This includes both damage and aim assist falloff.
Glaives, Grenade Launchers, and Trace Rifles share the ability gains of primary weapons.
Dealing Melee Damage grants +35 Handling for 3 seconds.
Being made invisible thanks to an Omnioculus Hunter grants
Wearing Omnioculus and being made invisible by another Omnioculus Hunter grants
|c Synapse Junctions |c Super Damage Increase |c % Slower Passive Super Drain
Kill while active add 4 seconds to the duration up to a maximum of 20 seconds.
Bosses are not finishable. Guardians share the effects of Elites.
|b Enemy Rank        |b Minor |b Elite |b Miniboss |b Boss
필살기를 사용하면 지속 시간이 5초 추가됩니다. 수호자는 리더 취급입니다.
击杀敌方守护者视为精英的效果。首领无法被终结。
|b 敌人等级          |b 普通 |b 精英 |b 次级首领 |b 首领
Glaives, Grenade Launchers, and Trace Rifles share the ability gains of primary weapons.
Dealing Melee Damage grants +35 Handling for 3 seconds.
偃月、追踪步枪、榴弹发射器相较其他特殊武器，仅获得一半能量。
使用近战技能造成伤害获得 +35 操控性，持续 3 秒。将
Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
Effect increases linearly as Health decreases. Maximized strength at Critical Health.
当生命值减少时，该效果线性提升，生命值降低到重伤时达到最高值。
+20 Recoil Direction & 5% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
+20 后座方向，降低 5% 瞄准时移动速度惩罚
Buff lasts until you are no longer at Critical Health, essentially serving as a Cooldown.
+10 Range, +10 Stability, and +10 Handling per stack.
每层增益 +10 射程，+10 稳定性，+10 操控性。
最高叠加 2 层，持续 15 秒。
Most weaken effects aside from Divinity can also activate it.
A 45 HP Void Overshield that provides 75% incoming damage resistance against PVE combatants.
大多数“虚弱”效果都可以触发该特性（神性除外）.
Unpowered Melee Attacks: 100% Increased Melee Damage.
Powered Melee Attacks: 40% Increased Melee Damage.
Bosses and Vehicles uniquely receive 25% increased melee damage. Bonus damage is multiplicative to the regular increase.
Overshield disappears instantly if you stop sprinting.
停止冲刺时覆盖护盾立即消失。
Can be refreshed to up to 6.5 seconds.
Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.
Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.
추가로 직업 능력의 기본 재생 속도가
额外的基础职业技能充能速度。
Amount of Noble Seekers spawned is equal to Fireteam Size-1, with a minimum of 1 Seeker.
Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift Duration gets extended by 5 seconds.
产生的高贵追踪弹数量等于队伍人数减 1，最低为 1 个。
每当一个高贵追踪弹施加一个增益效果，裂隙的持续时间延长 5 秒。
Aiming Down Sights while Airborne grants Tome of Dawn.
Buff can be refreshed through additional reloads. Persists through stow.
增益持续时间无法被再次换单而刷新。武器收起时保持生效。
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.
|c Weapon Type         |c   Damage Increase Increment |c   Maximum Damage Increase
Los proximos impactos aumentan en daño contra el escudo del enemigo.
El bufo se termina si se impacta contra un escudo con mismo elemento, o contra un enemigo sin escudo.
| Tipo de Arma          |   Por bala       |   hasta
当命中与武器元素匹配的元素护盾，或没有护盾的敌人时，移除伤害增益。

取恢复血量更多的那个值。

60% Increased damage per Hit for 5.5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.

On hit against Elite, Miniboss, or Boss Combatants:
Grants 20% increased damage per stack, up to 100% at 5 Stacks.
Consumes 1 stack per hit if at or below 5 stacks.
Consumes 5 stacks per hit if at or above 6 stacks.
命中精英、次级首领、首领敌人时：
每层增益 +20% 伤害，最高 100%。
当增益层数不高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 1 层增益。
当增益层数高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 5 层增益。
+50 Mobility, +100 Handling with a 0.6x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier
Reduces the Submachine Gun Aiming-Down-Sights Movement Penalty to 9%.
Linear Actuators applies Shocked for 2 seconds on enemy, which releases an Arc Static Charge that chains when another enemy is within 20 metres. Shocked is refreshed on chain.
[PVP] 85 Damage. Immune to additional chain damage for 2 seconds while Shocked.
선형 구동기가 맞은 적에게 2초 동안 충격을 남깁니다. 만약에 다른 적이 20미터 이내에 있을 경우 연쇄 번개가 일어납니다. 충격은 연쇄 번개 발동 이후 초기화됩니다.
85 피해. 맞은 이후 2초간 사막행군병의 효과에 면역.
"线性促动器"对敌人施加震荡 2 秒，释放一个连锁电弧，当另一个敌人在 20 米范围内时就会连锁。震荡会在连锁时被刷新。
[PVP] 85 伤害。在震荡状态下对额外的连锁伤害免疫，持续 2 秒。
On Champion Stun, Mini-Boss, or Boss Kill:
• Allies within 30 metres gain 50% Grenade and Melee Energy.
용사 기절, 미니보스 및 보스 처치 시:
30미터 이내에 있는 아군들은 수류탄과 근접 능력 에너지 50%를 받습니다.

Due to the ratio of Exlosive and Impact Damage being tied to the Blast Radius Stat on Grenade Launchers, a lower Blast Radius will provide a higher overall damage increase.
• 0 Blast Radius: 50% Impact | 50% Explosive, overall 25% increased damage
• 100 Blast Radius: 25% Impact | 75% Explosive, overall 12.5% increased damage.
因爆炸伤害和直击伤害的比例和榴弹发射器“爆炸范围”属性相关，故尖刺榴弹起作用时，更低的爆炸范围可造成更高的总伤害。
鼠标移动至此处查看细节

• 100 爆炸范围： 25% 直击 | 75% 爆炸，换算后实际 +12.5% 总伤害
